According to Scott C. Waring, the witness reported spotting a large, cigar-shaped UFO over a mile away from their location. Despite efforts to verify the sighting through radio frequency intercepts and visual confirmation, no concrete evidence was found. The witness's account remains unexplained, leaving room for further investigation and potential explanations. Unusual details in the video, such as its speed and rotation, contribute to the enigmatic nature of this case.
